_sText:
Hello!
Brief Description

Thank you very much for taking the time to look at my map. de_close is a defusal/aim map for CS:S. The map is close quarters and has fast combat situations.

In this map

The map contains one bomb site which separates the CT'S and the T's. There is also some cover at the left and right hand side of the bomb site for each team. The map was made in under 1 hour which is very obvious with its cube like design, however the point of this map was to see how much thrill the player can feel with its close quarters combat.
